product_title: Cliff House 59mm PolarizedPlus2® Metal Aviator Sunglasses
product_description: Classic aviator style defines polarized sunglasses crafted from ultra-light titanium.
product_details_and_care:
Classic aviator style defines polarized sunglasses crafted from ultra-light titanium. The scratch- and impact-resistant PolarizedPlus2 lenses enhance color while reducing glare.
59mm lens width; 15mm bridge width; 120mm temple length
100% UV protection
Adjustable nose pads
Scratch-resistant CLEARSHELL® lenses with PolarizedPlus2 technology
Titanium
Made in Japan
